invalidSubmitFiles: Submit files must be an object
invalidSubmitFilesLink: Submit files link must be a string
invalidSubmitFilesNotes: Submit files notes must be a string
requiredTitleEn: Title in English is required and must be a string
requiredTitleAr: Title in Arabic is required and must be a string
requiredPromoCode: Promo code is required and must be a string
futureStartDate: Start date must be in the future
greaterEndDate: End date must be greater than start date
positiveCouponCount: Coupon count must be an integer greater than or equal to 1
positiveUserCount: User count must be an integer greater than or equal to 1
arrayOfStrings: searchKeywords must be an array of strings
stringKeyword: Each search keyword must be a string
validStartDate: startDate must be a valid ISO 8601 date
validEndDate: endDate must be a valid ISO 8601 date
positiveMinValue: minValue must be a positive number
positiveMaxValue: maxValue must be a positive number
percentageMinValue: minPercentage must be a percentage between 0 and 100
percentageMaxValue: maxPercentage must be a percentage between 0 and 100
